Method Detail

addClass

boolean addClass(java.io.File file,
                 java.lang.String name)
A new class has been found

Parameters:
file - name of the file where the class was found
name - name of the class found
Returns:
true if the class found was unknown to the analyser

addDependency

boolean addDependency(java.lang.String from,
                      java.lang.String to)
A new dependency has been found

Parameters:
from - name of the class that has the dependency
to - name of the class on which the dependency occurs
Returns:
true if the dependency was unknown to the analyser
